resources.string: Arise with strength! For we have raised our flag,\nThe flag which has cost us dear\nWith extremes of thirst and pain.

My icon is my motherland,
And the whole world is its icon-stand,
Bright mounts and valleys
Are shared with God.
Saint Vincent, land so beautiful,\nWith joyful hearts we pledge to thee.\nOur loyalty and love and vow to keep you ever free.
Our Bahrain, Our King\nThe symbol of harmony.\nHigh-ranking in its Constitution Thy Charter represents the values Long live thy Kingdom of Bahrain!
To this sweet land, our mother, to which we owe our name,\nGuard her, Lord God, like always you have guarded,\nRemember her, which you have clothed with light.
